name: Shuckle
author: Emi Yoshida
flavor_text: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.

poke_body.name: Pot Shell
poke_body.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Shuckle by your opponent’s Pokémon that has any Special Energy cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Ferment Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. As long as the Defending Pokémon remains Poisoned by this attack, it can’t use any Poké-Body.
